common_issues.title: Authentication Failure on Desktop App (Pieces OS 4.3.1, Windows)
common_issues.description: Users are unable to sign in on the Pieces OS 4.3.1 desktop application for Windows.  The app displays a "sign in to continue" message but does not allow users to proceed with authentication.  Potential solutions include checking network connectivity, verifying account credentials, and ensuring the app is up-to-date.

related_issues.title: authentification
related_issues.text:
authentification
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [ ] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.3.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

"sign in to continue" and doesnt let me sign in to .. anything.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving authentication issues on the Windows desktop application for Pieces OS 4.3.1.
Investigate the root cause of the authentication failure, including network connectivity, credential verification, and app updates.
Update support documentation and FAQs with troubleshooting steps for the authentication issue.
Monitor the frequency of this issue to track the effectiveness of implemented solutions.
